title: Crime Alert 11.27.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.27.18
description:
Georgia woman sues after being jailed for three months. Cops thought her cotton candy was meth. US authorities clash with caravan at the border. No financial crime case to be brought against Harvey Weinstein.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
